add.requirement_reference: story_summary.json: presentation_layer_needs - 'Empty Cart View with Redirection Link'
add.description: Add explicit UI redirection link in empty cart view to 'continue shopping' as required by story acceptance criteria.
add.reason: LLD only shows a message for empty cart but does not specify redirection link, which is a required business rule.

add.requirement_reference: story_summary.json: business_logic_rules - 'Automatic recalculation of subtotal and total upon any quantity mutation.'
add.description: Add explicit logic for recalculation of subtotal and total whenever cart item quantity changes.
add.reason: LLD describes subtotal and total calculation but does not mandate recalculation on every mutation, which is required for business correctness.

modify.current_state: Allows adding items to cart and updating quantity, but does not enforce maximum order quantity validation on update.
modify.required_change: Update logic to validate that updated quantity does not exceed product's max_order_quantity when updating cart item quantity.
modify.reason: Story requires enforcement of max_order_quantity for all cart operations, but LLD only checks this on add, not update.

modify.current_state: Allows quantity change and removal, but does not display alert or prevent exceeding max_order_quantity.
modify.required_change: Add UI validation and alert to prevent quantity input exceeding max_order_quantity and display appropriate error message.
modify.reason: Story specifies business rule for maximum order quantity, but LLD frontend does not enforce or alert user.
